name: gl1tchb0y PROTOTYPE
description:
! WARNING !

POTENTIALLY TRIGGER SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY.

CONTROLLER:
Arrow Keys + SPACE

Experimental 2D glitch-art Game, made as tribute to "ch1p3r". An irc-bot phenomenon, which spammed a crazy chain-message interactive story [u r gl1tchb0y] online back at the late 80s.

Prototype created for educational purposes only, feel free to watch the trailer.

I challenge you to experience it, contact me, or even buy a coffee ;)
